text: That Summer may refer to: *That Summer!, a 1979 film starring Ray Winstone *"That Summer" (song), a 1993 song by Garth Brooks *That Summer (Drury novel), a 1965 novel by Allen Drury *That Summer (Dessen novel), a 1996 novel by Sarah Dessen *That Summer (Greig novel), a 2000 novel by Andrew Greig *That Summer (picture book), a 2002 children's book written by Tony Johnston and illustrated by Barry Moser *A Burning Hot Summer, a 2011 film directed by Philippe Garrel, pre-release title That Summer
title: That Summer
